data.text: @CanteringClark Its a hundred percent the reason. Look it up the man is terrified of Covid. Hes been doing long table meetings for a while. Go look at his meeting with Macron before the invasion.

@CanteringClark The main reason he does distance is because they are scared he will get covid. There was a time in the pandemic that he wasn't seen for a couple of days, and his people we're worried told by the media.
